text: Heartbreak Ridge is a 1986 American war movie directed by Clint Eastwood (who also stars) and also starring Marsha Mason, Everett McGill, Moses Gunn, Eileen Heckart, Bo Svenson, Boyd Gaines, Mario Van Peebles, Peter Koch, Tom Villard. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1987. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 war movies Category:American war movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies set in Grenada
title: Heartbreak Ridge
